attributes.action: Ignore suggestions on amending council and housing association tenants rights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We specifically request that a tenants right to accomodation for life is kept in place as a large number of tenants are vunerable ( through no fault of their own )and secure tenancies are often the only security they have. People need roots,the threat of upheavel could lead to a discontented, angry population with no feeling of belonging.
